title: [Resolved] level 6 and 7 mastery
body:
I have gotten s+  on fiora{{champion:114}}  before patch note 6.10 do i get a token for the champion 
if i have gotten s+ before or do i have to get S+ after the patch?

replies.body: Tokens are only given for rankings earned after patch 6.10. You can get Mastery level 6 tokens for S-, S, S+. After you've unlocked level 6, Mastery level 7 tokens require an S or S+
